name: Tiny Rewind Alien
description:
Puzzle game, developed in terms of Brackeys Jam 2020.2. 

This is a game about tiny alien, who has ability to rewind the time. The alien is just a kid yet, so can only make two rewinds and then the oldest copy will be forgotten. His father can do all 10 rewinds a time, but this game is not about his father:)

Help this Tiny Rewind Alien to find exit from these confused rooms. You'll face a lot of buttons which should be pressed, laser walls, and even Sleepy Green something. Use the most winding paths, then call Rewind!

I will be very grateful for your feedback!

I hope you'll enjoy the game!

I'm sorry for that, but I accidentally uploaded two versions for Linux. Here is the Windows version: https://daiman.itch.io/tiny-rewind-alien-windows
